nodeList.altText: You cannot pick up a new {Black Arrow} until you've expended your current {Black Arrow}.
nodeList.description: Summons 7 {Black Arrows} which rain from the sky over 4 seconds, granting bonus damage to your next bow attack when retrieved.
Using a {Black Arrow} grants increased damage over time to your next bow attack.

node.altText: You cannot pick up a new {Black Arrow} until you've expended your current {Black Arrow}.
node.description: Summons 7 {Black Arrows} which rain from the sky over 4 seconds, granting bonus damage to your next bow attack when retrieved.
{Black Arrows} are summoned more frequently. This does not cause more arrows to be summoned and also causes {Dark Quiver} to have a shorter duration.
Picking up a {Black Arrow} slows nearby enemies for a short duration.
Additional {Black Arrows} are summoned, but the arrows are summoned at the same frequency causing {Dark Quiver} to have a longer duration.

node.altText:
Shadows will repeat one skill you use before vanishing. Shadows can repeat Acid Flask, Shurikens or Shadow Cascade, and their damage scales with your damage stats. 

You can have 3 Shadows at once, and they will disappear after 5 seconds.
node.description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} creates a {Shadow} at the arrow's location.

node.altText: {Frenzy} grants 20% increased attack and cast speed. Does not stack.
node.description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} grants you the Frenzy buff, granting you 20% increased attack and cast speed for a short duration.
Picking up a {Black Arrow} restores health.
